thread.title: Volatility ETPs Plunge, Fueling Speculation Of Their Demise

author: Gunjan Banerji
title: Volatility ETPs Plunge, Fueling Speculation Of Their Demise
text:
The stock marketâ€™s sudden downturn wiped out much of the value of two exchange-traded products that investors had used to bet $4 billion on continued stability of stock prices.
Prices for both products were clobbered when the Cboe Volatility Index, which measures expected market swings, spiked 115.6% higher Monday, its biggest one-day jump on record. The gauge typically rises when stocks fall.
